value.title: CALCULATE in DAX #06: Using ALLSELECTED
value.excerpt: Learn how to correctly use ALLSELECTED in CALCULATE to compare a number with visual totals. value.title: Deep dive into measure filters in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this video, we perform a deep analysis of the DAX queries generated by Power BI when you use a measure as a filter in a Power BI visual. The DAX code generated might show a different behavior whether the measure is part of the values shown in the visual or not.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/721618?aff=yt

value.title: Implement advanced data visualization techniques by using Power BI
value.excerpt: Implement advanced data visualization techniques by using Power BI

topItems.title: Understand advanced data visualization concepts
topItems.excerpt: Create cohesive, inclusive, and efficient Power BI reports to effectively communicate results.

topItems.title: Monitor data in real-time with Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Describe real-time analytics in Power BI using automatic page refresh, real-time dashboards, and auto-refresh in paginated reports.

topItems.title: Create paginated reports
topItems.excerpt: Paginated reports allow report developers to create Power BI artifacts that have tightly controlled rendering requirements. Paginated reports are ideal for creating sales invoices, receipts, purchase orders, and tabular data. This module will teach you how to create reports, add parameters, and work with tables and charts in paginated reports.

value.title: Automate data cleaning with Power Query
value.excerpt: This module introduces Power Query in Microsoft Excel, a powerful data connection, cleaning, and shaping technology that is a core part of the Microsoft modern analytics suite of business intelligence tools.

value.title: Enforce Power BI model security
value.excerpt: Enforce model security in Power BI using row-level security and object-level security.

value.title: Get started with data warehouses in Microsoft Fabric
value.excerpt: Understand the key components and design considerations for implementation of data warehouses in Microsoft Fabric.

value.title: Integrate Power BI in Microsoft Teams and SharePoint
value.excerpt: This module goes into the different ways users can incorporate Power BI reports or visuals into Microsoft Teams and SharePoint to collaborate with others. This functionality allows users to pair analytics with collaboration tools they are already familiar with.

value.title: Monitor data in real-time with Power BI
value.excerpt: Describe real-time analytics in Power BI using automatic page refresh, real-time dashboards, and auto-refresh in paginated reports.

value.title: Automate Power BI administration
value.excerpt: Common manual tasks can be automated with Microsoft Power BI Cmdlets for Windows PowerShell and PowerShell core.

value.title: Configure Power BI report filters
value.excerpt: Report filtering is a complex topic because many techniques are available for filtering a Microsoft Power BI report. However, with complexity comes control, allowing you to design reports that meet requirements and expectations.

value.title: Structure analytical report designs in Power BI
value.excerpt: Designing an analytical report involves understanding the requirements and its audience. However, designing a compelling analytical report requires understanding the automatic and unconscious processes that occur when report consumers comprehend what they see. When you have the knowledge of how to structure and apply report design principles, you can raise the level of your report designs to produce relevant, intuitive, and visually pleasing experiences for your report consumers.

value.title: Understand advanced data visualization concepts
value.excerpt: Create cohesive, inclusive, and efficient Power BI reports to effectively communicate results.

value.title: Append and Merge Tables in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to quickly merge and append tables using the query editior in Power BI. Build models with multiple data sources. Contact me on LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/gaelimholland

value.title: Dynamic Outlier Detection and Visualization with DAX in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn the theory and best methods to create a dynamic sensitive outlier detectionand customize it to your particular dataset.

value.title: Price Prediction with Python and Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a machine learning price prediction using Python machine learning linear regression model and a dataset of 54,000 diamonds. This will be ported over to Power BI for a deeper level of interaction.  You can find the files and dataset here: https://github.com/Gaelim/Diamond-Price-Prediction

value.title: 2 ways to create a radial bar chart in  Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video I am going to show you 2 ways to create a radial bar chart in Power BI. One, we will use the visuals available in Power BI to fake one and the second method we will use charticulator to create our own and make it easier.  Here is the link to the charticulator playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLjS3oGhMuQ1S7Qf7-mBo_SFQyh6qHou4V

value.title: #38 Change currency using a slicer - Power BI Tips & Tricks #48
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how to change currencies using a slicer. The user will be able to convert sales to different currencies by choosing a currency from a slicer. The new measure that calculates the new values in the selected currency will be then formatted to the relevant currency.  To download
